name: Metro
description: Real world asset that give btc and membership to the staker of the coin

asset.name: Metro Transit Hub
asset.description: Major transit hub connecting subway, bus lines, and regional rail with commercial spaces and digital advertising infrastructure. Includes retail kiosks, office units, and a smart mobility integration system serving tens of thousands of commuters daily.
asset.staking: Stakers earn revenue shares from retail leasing, advertising billboards, and commuter service fees. Additional incentives are tied to long-term transit authority contracts and future smart-city infrastructure integrations.
